title: THESSALONIKI Response from the promotion of "Days of the Hellenic Republic"
content:
The promotion and open discussion organized by the racing moves on Saturday 2/3 at the AUTH School of Sciences on Saturday 2/3 is successful.


The documentary on the Pan-Hellenic course on 8/3 of 2007, the day of the Giannakou Framework Law, gave the trigger for discussion of the similarities of the movement at the time now, as next Friday 8/3, just 17 years later, is The voting of the N/S for private universities is scheduled. Mr. Kamaretsos, a '06-'07 movement, gave his images and data at the time, and especially from the historical course of 2007, while questions and interventions were asked by young and old fighters. The need to continue the fight until the law was overthrown and the debate ended with a call for participation in the Pan -Hellenic Athens demonstration on Friday.
author: Σ.Μ.
